mapper.insert: insert into tb_medicine(medno, name, factoryadd, description, price, medcount, photopath, categoryid) values (#{medNo}, #{name}, #{factoryAdd}, #{description}, #{price}, #{medCount}, #{photoPath}, #{categoryId});
mapper.select: select m.id,m.medNo,m.`name`,m.medCount,s.sellCount demand,m.photoPath,m.price,c.`name` categoryName,m.factoryAdd,m.description from tb_medicine m left join tb_category c on (m.categoryId=c.id) left join tb_selldetail s on (m.id=s.medid) where s.id = #{id}

select * from tb_medicine
and medNo like '%${medNo}%'
and `name` like '%${name}%'
and factoryAdd like '%${factoryAdd}%'
and description like '%${description}%'
